children.value:
import {
  Article,
  ScreenContainer,
  Button,
  HeroSection,
  Hero,
  HeroBody,
  HeroTitle,
  HeroTeaser,
  HeroActionList,
  HeroAction,
  FeatureSection,
  FeatureList,
  Feature,
  FeatureTitle,
  FeatureText,
  FeatureImage,
  SiblingNav,
  SiblingNavLink,
} from 'smooth-doc/components'
import { graphql, useStaticQuery, Link } from 'gatsby'
import codeImageURL from '../images/icons8-code-100.png'
import inspectCodeImageURL from '../images/icons8-inspect-code-100.png'
import markdownImageURL from '../images/icons8-markdown-100.png'
import variableImageURL from '../images/icons8-variable-100.png'
import registryEditorImageURL from '../images/icons8-registry-editor-100.png'
import systemTaskImageURL from '../images/icons8-system-task-100.png'
import webDesignImageURL from '../images/icons8-web-design-100.png'
import moduleImageURL from '../images/icons8-module-100.png'
import heroBackgroundURL from '../images/hero-background.png'
import GettingStarted from '../partials/getting-started.mdx'

<HeroSection>
  <ScreenContainer>
    <Hero backgroundImageURL={heroBackgroundURL}>
      <HeroBody>
        <HeroTitle>Create awesome docs without compromise</HeroTitle>
        <HeroTeaser>
          A ready-to-use Gatsby theme to build docs for all your projects.
          Smooth DOC makes documentation easy.
        </HeroTeaser>
        <HeroActionList>
          <HeroAction>
            <Button as={Link} to="/docs/getting-started/">
              Explore Docs
            </Button>
          </HeroAction>
        </HeroActionList>
      </HeroBody>
    </Hero>
  </ScreenContainer>
</HeroSection>
<FeatureSection>
  <FeatureList>
    <Feature>
      <FeatureImage src={registryEditorImageURL} />
      <FeatureTitle>Use Gatsby</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText>
        Gatsby is a powerful static website generator. It gives you amazing web
        perf.
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature>
      <FeatureImage src={markdownImageURL} />
      <FeatureTitle>Powered by MDX</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText>
        MDX combines Markdown and JSX. You can use your own components in
        Markdown-style files.
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature>
      <FeatureImage src={webDesignImageURL} />
      <FeatureTitle>Custom Theme & Dark Mode</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText>
        Dark mode is natively supported and theme is fully customizable!
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature>
      <FeatureImage src={moduleImageURL} />
      <FeatureTitle>Ready-to-use components</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText>
        A set of ready-to-use components to build great landing pages.
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature>
      <FeatureImage src={codeImageURL} />
      <FeatureTitle>React Live Code Editor</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText>
        Give life to your docs with Live Code Editing. Users can edit examples
        and see changes in real-time!
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature>
      <FeatureImage src={systemTaskImageURL} />
      <FeatureTitle>Enhanced SEO</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText>
        Smooth DOC handles all SEO metadata, sitemap and social sharing for you.
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature>
      <FeatureImage src={inspectCodeImageURL} />
      <FeatureTitle>Algolia DocSearch</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText>
        A good search is a real asset for a documentation. Algolia DocSearch is
        built-in!
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature>
      <FeatureImage src={variableImageURL} />
      <FeatureTitle>Carbon Ads</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText>
        Monetizing your open source project is often hard. Carbon Ads support
        makes it easier!
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
  </FeatureList>
</FeatureSection>
<ScreenContainer as="section" py={5}>
  <Article>
    <GettingStarted />
    <SiblingNav>
      <SiblingNavLink type="next" to="/docs/getting-started/">
        Read full documentation
      </SiblingNavLink>
    </SiblingNav>
  </Article>
</ScreenContainer>

scopeImports:
import {
  Article,
  ScreenContainer,
  Button,
  HeroSection,
  Hero,
  HeroBody,
  HeroTitle,
  HeroTeaser,
  HeroActionList,
  HeroAction,
  FeatureSection,
  FeatureList,
  Feature,
  FeatureTitle,
  FeatureText,
  FeatureImage,
  SiblingNav,
  SiblingNavLink,
} from 'smooth-doc/components'
val.rawMDXOutput:
/* @jsx mdx */
import { mdx } from '@mdx-js/react';
/* @jsxRuntime classic */
/* @jsx mdx */
import {
  Article,
  ScreenContainer,
  Button,
  HeroSection,
  Hero,
  HeroBody,
  HeroTitle,
  HeroTeaser,
  HeroActionList,
  HeroAction,
  FeatureSection,
  FeatureList,
  Feature,
  FeatureTitle,
  FeatureText,
  FeatureImage,
  SiblingNav,
  SiblingNavLink,
} from 'smooth-doc/components'
import { graphql, useStaticQuery, Link } from 'gatsby'
import codeImageURL from '../images/icons8-code-100.png'
import inspectCodeImageURL from '../images/icons8-inspect-code-100.png'
import markdownImageURL from '../images/icons8-markdown-100.png'
import variableImageURL from '../images/icons8-variable-100.png'
import registryEditorImageURL from '../images/icons8-registry-editor-100.png'
import systemTaskImageURL from '../images/icons8-system-task-100.png'
import webDesignImageURL from '../images/icons8-web-design-100.png'
import moduleImageURL from '../images/icons8-module-100.png'
import heroBackgroundURL from '../images/hero-background.png'
import GettingStarted from '../partials/getting-started.mdx'
export const _frontmatter = {
  "slug": "/"
};

const layoutProps = {
  _frontmatter
};
const MDXLayout = "wrapper"
export default function MDXContent({
  components,
  ...props
}) {
  return <MDXLayout {...layoutProps} {...props} components={components} mdxType="MDXLayout">

    <HeroSection mdxType="HeroSection">
  <ScreenContainer mdxType="ScreenContainer">
    <Hero backgroundImageURL={heroBackgroundURL} mdxType="Hero">
      <HeroBody mdxType="HeroBody">
        <HeroTitle mdxType="HeroTitle">Create awesome docs without compromise</HeroTitle>
        <HeroTeaser mdxType="HeroTeaser">
          A ready-to-use Gatsby theme to build docs for all your projects.
          Smooth DOC makes documentation easy.
        </HeroTeaser>
        <HeroActionList mdxType="HeroActionList">
          <HeroAction mdxType="HeroAction">
            <Button as={Link} to="/docs/getting-started/" mdxType="Button">
              Explore Docs
            </Button>
          </HeroAction>
        </HeroActionList>
      </HeroBody>
    </Hero>
  </ScreenContainer>
    </HeroSection>
    <FeatureSection mdxType="FeatureSection">
  <FeatureList mdxType="FeatureList">
    <Feature mdxType="Feature">
      <FeatureImage src={registryEditorImageURL} mdxType="FeatureImage" />
      <FeatureTitle mdxType="FeatureTitle">Use Gatsby</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText mdxType="FeatureText">
        Gatsby is a powerful static website generator. It gives you amazing web
        perf.
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature mdxType="Feature">
      <FeatureImage src={markdownImageURL} mdxType="FeatureImage" />
      <FeatureTitle mdxType="FeatureTitle">Powered by MDX</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText mdxType="FeatureText">
        MDX combines Markdown and JSX. You can use your own components in
        Markdown-style files.
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature mdxType="Feature">
      <FeatureImage src={webDesignImageURL} mdxType="FeatureImage" />
      <FeatureTitle mdxType="FeatureTitle">Custom Theme & Dark Mode</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText mdxType="FeatureText">
        Dark mode is natively supported and theme is fully customizable!
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature mdxType="Feature">
      <FeatureImage src={moduleImageURL} mdxType="FeatureImage" />
      <FeatureTitle mdxType="FeatureTitle">Ready-to-use components</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText mdxType="FeatureText">
        A set of ready-to-use components to build great landing pages.
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature mdxType="Feature">
      <FeatureImage src={codeImageURL} mdxType="FeatureImage" />
      <FeatureTitle mdxType="FeatureTitle">React Live Code Editor</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText mdxType="FeatureText">
        Give life to your docs with Live Code Editing. Users can edit examples
        and see changes in real-time!
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature mdxType="Feature">
      <FeatureImage src={systemTaskImageURL} mdxType="FeatureImage" />
      <FeatureTitle mdxType="FeatureTitle">Enhanced SEO</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText mdxType="FeatureText">
        Smooth DOC handles all SEO metadata, sitemap and social sharing for you.
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature mdxType="Feature">
      <FeatureImage src={inspectCodeImageURL} mdxType="FeatureImage" />
      <FeatureTitle mdxType="FeatureTitle">Algolia DocSearch</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText mdxType="FeatureText">
        A good search is a real asset for a documentation. Algolia DocSearch is
        built-in!
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
    <Feature mdxType="Feature">
      <FeatureImage src={variableImageURL} mdxType="FeatureImage" />
      <FeatureTitle mdxType="FeatureTitle">Carbon Ads</FeatureTitle>
      <FeatureText mdxType="FeatureText">
        Monetizing your open source project is often hard. Carbon Ads support
        makes it easier!
      </FeatureText>
    </Feature>
  </FeatureList>
    </FeatureSection>
    <ScreenContainer as="section" py={5} mdxType="ScreenContainer">
  <Article mdxType="Article">
    <GettingStarted mdxType="GettingStarted" />
    <SiblingNav mdxType="SiblingNav">
      <SiblingNavLink type="next" to="/docs/getting-started/" mdxType="SiblingNavLink">
        Read full documentation
      </SiblingNavLink>
    </SiblingNav>
  </Article>
    </ScreenContainer>

    </MDXLayout>;
}

;
MDXContent.isMDXComponent = true;
